title: Experience Bug
body:
I played a few games last night in the mid lane and noticed some strange interactions. I played Corki into Zed and was ahead in cs (30 cs to 17 cs), was in exp range the whole time, and he hit lvl 5 while I was lvl 4.

Also I played a game as TF vs Syndra and was being poked out / zoned, however I out leveled her at around level 4 as well, was about 15 cs behind her, even after an early back (and she shoved the lane into tower meaning I should have lost exp).

Suspect there's an experience, or catch up experience bug. Not aware of any exp runes or early cheese in the jg.

replies.body:
The thing your not thinking about is, hitting the CS isn't required for EXP.

It's a matter of, the higher level person, has generally stayed in lane, and not backed, hence they haven't missed any waves worth of EXP.
